nodes.text: Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO: The Droid Colouring Book of the Future

Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO: The Droid Colouring Book of the Future is a coloring book based on the Star Wars: Droids animated television series. It published by Dragon Books on December 10, 1987.
